root.name: Kidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza: Haro no Puyo Puyo
root.description: OverviewKidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza: Haro no Puyo Puyo is a Puyo Puyo game based on the Mobile Suit Gundam franchise, the original TV series in particular. Puyos are replaced by Haros, and several Gundam characters are playable. The game features a story mode, a verses mode, and a survival mode where random characters throw garbage Haros into the player's field. Â Whenever a chain is completed, the chosen character will shout a famous phrase from the anime series; the game provides a large number of phrases that can be assigned to each character by the player.
